result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Plea date on November 29, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Scheduling conference on July 6, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.   Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for further proceedings.   
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.   Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.   Offer deadline with DA is set for 05-27-22 at 8:30 a.m.    Scheduling conference is set for 07-06-22 at 9:00 a.m.   
Minutes.

Attorney Harrison requests an adjournments.  Court finds good cause to toll the time limit. Defendant waives the time period within which a preliminary hearing must be held.

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on March 2, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

2:10 pm - Prosecuting attorney Angelina R Scarpelli appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Daniel Cole Lepak appeared by video, Attorney Luke K Harrison appeared in court for Daniel Cole Lepak. Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 2, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

10:12 AM Defendant Daniel Cole Lepak appeared by video, Attorney Jill Vendetti appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant wishes to set the matter over to try to get attorney. 
Bail is set at $5,000 recognizance bond with the conditions that he must maintain absolute sobriety. Court orders photos and prints at MTSO. 
Defendant is to report to the Clerk of Court's Office by close of business on Friday, February 25, 2022 to sign his bail bond.
Initial appearance scheduled for February 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
RE:  Reckless Driving Causing Great Bodily Harm on 08-02-2021.
